channel.title: How do i make it so the highest lvl in a skill u can get is 120?
channel.description: How can i make it were your skills can go as high as lvl 120, it feels weird asking the question im the one people usually are asking lol anyway if anyone could help thad be good :) :D ;D :rolleyes: :cool:

item.title: How do i make it so the highest lvl in a skill u can get is 120?
item.dc:creator: @Tyrael Tyrael
item.description:
@Tyrael wrote:

Search for something like this in client.java

	public int getLevelForXP(int exp)

This is what mine looks like.

[code] public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
    		return lvl;
		}
		}
		[b]return 100;[/b]

}[/code]

Change the return 100; to 120.

-tyrael-

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make it so the highest lvl in a skill u can get is 120?
